detail: Pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering from Amity University Uttar Pradesh[2014 - Present].
Machine Learning Foundation Nanodegree Udacity (Certificate Earned on 14th August, 2017).
Machine Learning by Stanford University on Coursera. Certificate earned on January 18, 2017.
10 + 2 from Rosary Senior Secondary School [2013] CBSE Board with 89% Marks.
High School from Rosary Senior Secondary School [2011] CBSE Board with 8.4 CGPA.

detail.head: Computer Science Faculty | StarLight Academy
detail.article: Computer Science faculty teaching courses like C/C++, Java and Python with advanced courses like Android Application Development and Machine Learning.

detail.head: Intern | StarLight Academy
detail.article: Designed the front end (User Interface) of the academy's website. Latest figures of the advancement in admission figures will be released after website is made online.

detail.head: Intern | Institute of System Studies and Analysis, Defence Research and Development Organisation (D.R.D.O)
detail.article: Made a Mission Simulator Editor that can generate a Drools file from data entered by the user in the Editor. The Drool file generated is used to run a simulator to see the efficiency of the Mission planned.

detail.head: Vice President | Amity Software Testing Club, Amity University
detail.article: Organised various  Workshops and delivered speaker sessions on Android Application Development and Machine Learning.

detail.head: Vice President | Amity Software Engineering Club, Amity University
detail.article: Re-establishing the club and making a combined effort to bring it up on the mark.

detail.head: Android Application Development Workshop
detail.article: Gave an introductory workshop on Android Application Development organized by Amity Software Testing Club, Amity University, Noida.
